actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to postpone for 3 months the application of certain Federal standards governing the provision of child day care services under the new social services program.

summary.text: Postpones for three months the application of Federal standards governing the provision of child day care services under the new social services program of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XX of the Social Security Act to postpone for 3 months the application of certain Federal standards governing the provision of child day care services under the new social services program.
